basics.name: Eric Shane Gaymon
basics.label: Recent Graduate
basics.summary: A German-born theoretical physicist, widely ranked among the greatest and most influential scientists of all time

work.name: DataWorks Plus
work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.

projects.name: Good Driver Incentive Program
projects.summary: As part of a semester long group project, I was able to participate in a mock iteration of the software development lifecycle using Agile processes. We analyzed, designed, and deployed a full stack web application using Microsoft's .NET and C#. The focus of the project required us to enable mock companies to reward commercial truck through a cloud based portal. ...

projects.name: Pizzeria Management System
projects.summary: For this project, I designed and implemented a MySQL database to track the day-to-day operations of a mock pizzeria. Alongside the database, I developed a Java application to allow users to interact with the database using a command line interface. ...
